sentences.english: The flavonoids content in pulp was very low, and relatively stable.
sentences.chinese: 果皮中类黄酮主要是橙皮苷，且呈现下降趋势。

sentences.english: Studies suggest that diets abundant in flavonoid-rich foods can lower heart disease risk.
sentences.chinese: 研究建议食用大量富含类黄酮的食物来降低得病率。

sentences.english: Please note, this product contains bioflavonoids which do not dissolve.
sentences.chinese: 请注意，此产品含有生物类黄酮不溶解。

sentences.english: Gingko biloba leaves, while rich in other flavonoids, do not contain fisetin.
sentences.chinese: 银杏叶虽然富含类黄酮，但是却不含非瑟酮。

sentences.english: Besides, the flavonoids are maximum in dark chocolate.
sentences.chinese: 此外，类黄酮素在黑巧克力中含量最大。

sentences.english: It contains bioflavonoids, one of which is a natural antibiotic.
sentences.chinese: 它含有类黄酮，其中之一，是一种天然抗生素。

sentences.english: Chocolate contains flavonoid antioxidants that are widely believed to have beneficial cardiovascular effects.
sentences.chinese: 巧克力中含有的类黄酮抗氧化剂，对心血管疾病有益。

sentences.english: Bioflavonoids are complex organic plant compounds found mostly in fruits and vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 生物类黄酮存在于水果和蔬菜的有机合成体。

sentences.english: Let green tea to be your daily beverage because it contains tremendous amount of antioxidant flavonoid, catechins .
sentences.chinese: 每天喝绿茶，绿茶中含有大量抗氧化剂类黄酮和茶酸。

sentences.english: Vitamin C Chewable Tablets with Bioflavonoids - Aspartame FreeChewable orange &apricot.
sentences.chinese: 维生素C与生物类黄酮咀嚼片。

zi4 you2 ji1 qing1 chu2 ji4
